name: @tpmjs/tools-slack
description: Slack API tools for AI agents. Send messages, manage channels, list users, search messages, upload files, and more.

tools.name: sendMessage
tools.description: Send a message to a Slack channel or thread.

tools.name: listChannels
tools.description: List public and private channels in a Slack workspace.

tools.name: getChannel
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific Slack channel.

tools.name: listUsers
tools.description: List all users in a Slack workspace.

tools.name: getUser
tools.description: Get profile details of a specific Slack user.

tools.name: addReaction
tools.description: Add an emoji reaction to a Slack message.

tools.name: uploadFile
tools.description: Upload a text file or snippet to a Slack channel.

tools.name: setChannelTopic
tools.description: Set the topic of a Slack channel.

tools.name: listMessages
tools.description: Retrieve recent messages from a Slack channel.

tools.name: searchMessages
tools.description: Search for messages across a Slack workspace.
